description: User submits a prompt - beforeSubmitPrompt hook fires
prompt: Can you create a Python function to calculate fibonacci numbers?

description: Agent thinks - afterAgentThought hook fires (thinking block 1)
text: I need to create a Python function for fibonacci. I'll write it to a file and then test it.

description: Agent edits a file - afterFileEdit hook fires
Agent thinks again - afterAgentThought hook fires (thinking block 2)
text: Now I'll run the Python file to show the output.

description: Agent runs shell command - afterShellExecution hook fires
Agent uses MCP tool (example) - afterMCPExecution hook fires
Agent finishes responding - afterAgentResponse hook fires (sends root span)
text: I've created a fibonacci function in fibonacci.py and tested it. The output shows the first 10 fibonacci numbers correctly.
